name: Karateassistant
0:
”Alexa, start Karate assistant”
”Tell a kihon”
”Let's practice some words”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: karate assistant
des:
This skill is for people who already have karate background (adult or child).
It tells you kihon that you can practice in 1 step (so you can do them in a small place).
One can also revise the words in Japanese by choosing the color of the belt (yellow, orange, green, blue, brown, black) and do it with or without the translation.
Good training !!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
